citation.article-title: Characterization of the mycoplasmalike organism associated with witches'-broom disease of lime and proposition of a Candidatus taxon for the organism, "Candidatus phytoplasma aurantifolia"

p.s: Description of Phytoplasma aurantifolia sp. nov.

"Candidatus Phytoplasma aurantifolia" [(Mollicutes) NC; NA; 0; NAS (GenBank number U15442), oligonucleotide sequence complementary to unique region of 16s rRNA 5'-GCAAGTGGTGAACCATTTGTTT-3'S; (Citrus, phloem; Hishimonus phycitis (Cicadellidae), hemolymph, salivary glands); MI.
